problem.markdown:
>>From an environmental science perspective, it is essential to first consider _________________ when choosing among energy sources.<<
( ) renewable and nonrenewable choices ( ) effectiveness and inputs (x) conservation and efficiency ( ) history and economics ( ) emissions and byproducts
[explanation] When choosing energy sources, it is essential to consider conservation and efficiency first! [explanation]
problem.p: From an environmental science perspective, it is essential to first consider _________________ when choosing among energy sources.

choicegroup.label: From an environmental science perspective, it is essential to first consider _________________ when choosing among energy sources.

div.p: When choosing energy sources, it is essential to consider conservation and efficiency first!
